name: Mohor aka Ghu ghu buri
greetingText: I really like your name btw! I wish I could be there with you :( but nevertheless I already feel close to you than others in my life.
wishText: Could your birthday BE any more special? One day I promise dinko will be with you. Promise and you will get lots of chocolate too. I know you are thinking I am so cheesy. Still-EEEEEEEEEEEEE;)
